product_name: Oakley Wiretap Polarized Sunglasses - Tungsten Frame - Men's
long_description: Inspired by vintage bombers and classic race cars, the Oakley Wiretap Polarized Sunglasses use a streamlined tungsten-colored frame to offer a fresh new look for semi-rimless sun protection.
short_description: Inspired by vintage bombers and classic race cars, the Oakley Wiretap Polarized Sunglasses use a streamlined tungsten-colored frame to offer a fresh new look for semi-rimless sun protection.
